titles.title: For the relief of Griselda Lopez Negrete.
For the relief of Griselda Lopez Negrete.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Griselda Lopez Negrete to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
